words.en: O (mankind)||(O) mankind||Fear||your Lord||Indeed||(the) convulsion||(of) the Hour||(is) a thing||great

translations.text: Yaaa'ayyuhan naasut taqoo Rabbakum; inna zalzalatas Saa'ati shai'un 'azeem

words.id: pada hari||kamu melihatnya||tidak ingat/lupa||tiap-tiap/semua||wanita yang menyusui anak||dari apa (anak)||disusukannya||dan meletakkan/gugurlah||tiap-tiap/semua||yang mempunyai||kandungan (mengandung)||kandungannya||dan kamu melihat||manusia||mabuk||dan/padahal||mereka tidak||dengan mabuk||akan tetapi||azab||Allah||sangat keras
words.en: (The) Day||you will see it||will forget||every||nursing mother||that which||she was nursing||and will deliver||every||pregnant woman||pregnant woman||her load||and you will see||[the] mankind||intoxicated||while not||they||(are) intoxicated||but||(the) punishment||(of) Allah||(will be) severe

translations.text: Yawma tarawnahaa tazhalu kullu murdi'atin 'ammaaa arda'at Wa-tada'u kullu zaati hamlin hamlahaa Wa-taran naasa sukaaraa Wa-maa hum bisukaaraa Wa-lakinna 'azaabal laahi shadeed

words.id: dan diantara||manusia||orang||ia membantah||dalam/tentang||Allah||dengan tidak/tanpa||ilmu pengetahuan||dan ia mengikuti||setiap/semua||syaitan||sangat jahat
words.en: And among||the mankind||(is he) who||disputes||concerning||Allah||without||knowledge||and follows||every||devil||rebellious

translations.text: Wa-minan naasi maien yujaadilu fil laahi bighairi ilminw Wa-yattabi'u kullaa shaitaanim mareed

translations.text: Kutiba alaihi annahoo man tawallaahu fa-annahoo yudilluhoo Wa-yahdeehi ilaa azaabis sa'eer

words.en: O mankind||O mankind||If||you are||in||doubt||about||the Resurrection||then indeed, We||We created you||from||dust||then||from||a semen-drop||then||from||a clinging substance||then||from||an embryonic lump||formed||and unformed||and unformed||that We may make clear||to you||And We cause to remain||in||the wombs||what||We will||for||a term||appointed||then||We bring you out||(as) a child||[then]||that you may reach||[your] maturity||And among you||(is he) who||dies||and among you||(is he) who||is returned||to||the most abject||age||so that not||he knows||after||after||having known||anything||And you see||the earth||barren||then when||We send down||on it||water||it gets stirred||and it swells||and grows||of||every||kind||beautiful

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu in kuntum fee raibin minal ba'thi fa-innaa khalaqnaakum min turaabin thumma min nutfatin thumma min alaqatin thumma min mudghatin mukhallaqatinw Wa-ghairi mukhallaqatin linubaiyina lakum; Wa-nuqirru fil arhaami maa nashaaa'u ilaaa ajalin musamman thumma nukhrijukum tiflan thumma litablughooo ashuddakum Wa-minkum mai yutawaffa Wa-minkum mai yuraddu ilaaa arzalil umuri likailaa ya'lama min ba'di ilmin shai'aa; Wa-taral arda haamidatan fa-izaaa anzalnaa alaihal maaa'ah tazzat Wa-rabat Wa-ambatat min kulli zawjin baheej

words.id: demikian itu||bahwasanya||Allah||Dia||yang hak||dan bahwasanya Dia||Dia menghidupkan||yang mati||dan bahwasanya Dia||atas||segala||sesuatu||Maha Kuasa
words.en: That||(is) because||Allah||He||(is) the Truth||And that He||[He] gives life||(to) the dead||and that He||(is) over||every||thing||All-Powerful

translations.text: Zaalika bi-annal laaha Huwal haqqu Wa-annahoo yuhyil mawtaa Wa-annahoo 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||kiamat||datang||tidak ada||keraguan||didalamnya/padanya||dan sesungguhnya||Allah||Dia membangkitkan||orang||dalam||kubur
words.en: And that||the Hour||will come||(there is) no||doubt||about it||and that||Allah||will resurrect||(those) who||(are) in||the graves

translations.text: Wa-annas Saa'ata aatiyatul laa raiba feeha Wa-annal laaha yab'asu man fil quboor

words.id: dan diantara||manusia||orang||ia membantah||dalam/tentang||Allah||dengan tidak/tanpa||ilmu pengetahuan||dan tidak/tanpa||petunjuk||dan tidak/tanpa||kitab||bercahaya/terang
words.en: And among||mankind||(is he) who||disputes||concerning||Allah||without||any knowledge||and not||any guidance||and not||a Book||enlightening

translations.text: Wa-minan naasi maien yujaadilu fil laahi bighairi ilminw Wa-laa hudanw Wa-laa Kitaabim Muneer

words.id: bengkok/palingkan||lambungnya||untuk menyesatkan||dari||jalan||Allah||baginya||di||dunia||kehinaan||dan Kami akan merasakan kepadanya||hari||kiamat||azab||yang membakar
words.en: Twisting||his neck||to mislead||from||(the) way||(of) Allah||For him||in||the world||(is) disgrace||and We will make him taste||(on the) Day||(of) Resurrection||(the) punishment||(of) the Burning Fire

translations.text: Saaniya itfihee liyudilla 'an sabeelil laahi lahoo fid dunyaa khizyunw Wa-nuzeequhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati azaabal hareeq

words.en: That||(is) for what||have sent forth||your hands||and that||Allah||is not||unjust||to His slaves

translations.text: Zaalika bimaa qaddamat yadaaka Wa-annal laaha laisa bizallaamil lil'abeed

words.id: dan diantara||manusia||orang||ia menyembah||Allah||atas||tepi||maka jika||menimpanya/memperoleh||kebaikan||tenteramlah ia||dengannya||dan jika||menimpanya||fitnah/bencana||berbaliklah ia||atas||mukanya||rugilah ia||di dunia||dan akhirat||demikian itu||ia/itulah||kerugian||yang nyata
words.en: And among||the mankind||(is he) who||worships||Allah||on||an edge||And if||befalls him||good||he is content||with it||and if||befalls him||a trial||he turns||on||his face||He has lost||the world||and the Hereafter||That||[it]||(is) the loss||clear

translations.text: Wa-minan naasi maien ya'budul laaha 'alaa harfin fa-in asaabahoo khairunit maanna bihee Wa-in asaabat-hu fitnatunin qalaba 'alaa wajhihee khasirad dunyaa wal-aakhirah; zaalika huwal khusraanul mubeen

words.id: ia menyeru||dari||selain||Allah||apa/sesuatu||yang tidak||memberi mudarat kepadanya||dan apa/sesuatu||yang tidak||memberi manfaat kepadanya||demikian itu||ia/itu||kesesatan||yang jauh
words.en: He calls||besides||besides||Allah||what||not||harms him||and what||not||benefits him||That||[it]||(is) the straying||far away

translations.text: Yad'oo min doonil laahi maa laa yadurruhoo Wa-maa laa yanfa'uh' zaalika huwad dalaalul ba'ed

words.id: ia menyeru||pada sesuatu||mudaratnya||lebih dekat||dari||manfaatnya||sungguh sejahat-jahat||penolong||dan sungguh sejahat-jahat||kawan
words.en: He calls||(one) who||his harm||(is) closer||than||his benefit||Surely an evil||protector||and surely an evil||friend!

translations.text: Yad'oo laman darruhooo aqrabu min naf'ih; labi'sal mawlaa Wa-labi'sal 'asheer

translations.text: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaahu aayaatim baiyinaatinw Wa-annal laaha yahdee mai yureed

translations.text: Alam tara annal laaha yasjudu lahoo man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ardi wash-shamsu walqamaru wan-nu-joomu wal-jibaalu wash-shajaru wad-dawaaabbu Wa-kaseerum minan naasi Wa-kaseerun haqqa alaihil 'azaab; Wa-maien yuhinil laahu famaa lahoo mim mukrim; innal laaha yaf'alu maa yashaaa

words.id: inilah (dua) golongan||keduanya saling bertengkar||mereka bertengkar||dalam/tentang||Tuhan mereka||maka orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dipotongkan/dibuatkan||untuk mereka||pakaian||dari||api neraka||disiramkan||dari||atas||kepala mereka||air mendidih

translations.text: Haazaani khasmaanikh tasamoo fee Rabbihim fal-lazeena kafaroo qutti'at lahum siyaabum min naar; yusabbu min fawqi ru'oosihimul hameem

words.id: dihancurluluhkan||dengannya (air mendidih)||apa||dalam||perut mereka||dan kulit-kulit

translations.text: Yusharu bihee maa fee butoonihim waljulood

words.id: dan untuk mereka||cambuk-cambuk||dari||besi
words.en: And for them||(are) hooked rods||of||iron

translations.text: Wa-lahum maqaami'u min hadeed

words.id: setiap kali||mereka hendak||(bahwa)||mereka keluar||dari padanya||dari/lantaran||kesengsaraan||mereka dikembalikan||kedalamnya||dan rasakanlah||azab||yang membakar
words.en: Every time||they want||to||come out||from it||from||anguish||they will be returned||therein||Taste||(the) punishment||(of) the Burning Fire!

translations.text: Kullamaa araadooo any yakhrujoo minhaa min ghammin u'eedoo feeha Wa-zooqoo 'azaabal hareeq

translations.text: innal laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min asaawira min zahabinw Wa-lu'lu'aa; Wa-libaasuhum feehaa hareer

translations.text: Wa-hudooo ilat taiyibi minal qawli Wa-hudooo ilaaa siraatil hameed

words.id: sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dan mereka menghalang-halangi||dari||jalan||Allah||dan Masjidil||Haram||yang||telah Kami jadikannya||untuk manusia||sama/bersama||bertekun/menetap||didalamnya||dan datang berkunjung||dan barangsiapa||menghendaki/bermaksud||didalamnya||melakukan kejahatan||dengan/secara zalim||Kami rasakan kepadanya||dari||azab||yang pedih

words.id: dan ketika||Kami memberi tempat||kepada Ibrahim||tempat||rumah/Baitullah||bahwa||janganlah||kamu mempersekutukan||dengan Aku||segala sesuatu||dan sucikanlah||rumah-Ku||bagi orang-orang yang tawaf||dan orang-orang yang berdiri/beribadat||dan orang-orang yang ruku'||orang-orang yang sujud

translations.text: Wa-iz bawwaanaa li-ibraaheema makaanal Baiti al laa tushrik bee shai'anw Wa-tahhir Baitiya litaaa'ifeena walqaaa'-imeena warrukka-'is sujood

translations.text: Wa-azzin fin naasi bil-Hajji yaatooka rijaalanw Wa-'alaa kulli daamirien yaateena min kulli fajjin 'ameeq

translations.text: Li-yashhadoo manaafi'a lahum Wa-yazkurus mal laahi feee ayyaamim ma'loomaatin 'alaa maa razaqahum mim baheematil an'aami fakuloo minhaa Wa-at'imul baaa'isal faqeer

words.id: kemudian||hendaklah mereka menghilangkan||kotoran mereka||dan hendaklah mereka menyempurnakan||nadzar mereka||dan hendaklah mereka bertawaf||di rumah||kuno/tua
words.en: Then||let them complete||their prescribed duties||and fulfil||their vows||and circumambulate||the House||[the] Ancient

translations.text: Summal yaqdoo tafasahum wal-yoofoo nuzoorahum wal-yattawwafoo bil-Baitil 'Ateeq

words.id: demikianlah||dan barangsiapa||memuliakan/menghormati||larangan/peraturan||Allah||maka dia/itu||lebih baik||baginya||di sisi||Tuhannya||dan dihalalkan||bagi kalian||binatang ternak||kecuali||apa yang||dibacakan/diterangkan||atas kalian||maka jauhilah||kekotoran/kenajisan||dari||berhala-berhala||dan jauhilah||perkataan||dusta
words.en: That||and whoever||honors||(the) sacred rites||(of) Allah||then it||(is) best||for him||near||his Lord||And are made lawful||to you||the cattle||except||what||is recited||to you||So avoid||the abomination||of||the idols||and avoid||(the) word||false

translations.text: Zaalika Wa-maien yu'azzim hurumaatil laahi fahuwa khairul lahoo inda Rabbih; Wa-uhillat lakumul an'aamu illaa maa yutlaa alaikum fajtanibur rijsa minal awsaani wajtaniboo qawlaz zoor

words.id: lurus/ikhlas||bagi/kepada Allah||bukan/tidak||mempersekutukan||dengan-Nya/Dia||dan barangsiapa||mempersekutukan||dengan Allah||maka seakan-akan||dia tersungkur/jatuh||dari||langit||maka/lalu menyambarnya||burung||atau||menerbangkan||dengannya/kepadanya||angin||dalam||tempat||jauh
words.en: Being upright||to Allah||not||associating partners||with Him||And whoever||associates partners||with Allah||then (it is) as though||he had fallen||from||the sky||and (had) snatched him||the birds||or||had blown||him||the wind||to||a place||far off

translations.text: Hunafaaa'a lillaahi ghaira mushrikeena bih; Wa-maien yushrik billaahi faka-annamaa kharra minas samaaa'i fatakh-tafuhut tairu aw tahwee bihir reehu fee makaanin saheeq

words.id: demikianlah||dan barangsiapa||memuliakan/menghormati||syi'ar-syi'ar||Allah||maka sesungguhnya itu||dari||ketakwaan||hati
words.en: That||and whoever||honors||(the) Symbols||(of) Allah||then indeed it||(is) from||(the) piety||(of) the hearts

translations.text: Zaalika Wa-mai yu'azzim sha'aaa'iral laahi fa-innahaa min taqwal quloob

words.en: For you||therein||(are) benefits||for||a term||appointed||then||their place of sacrifice||(is) at||the House||the Ancient

translations.text: Lakum feehaa manaafi'u ilaaa ajalim musamman summa mahilluhaaa ilal Baitil 'Ateeq

words.id: dan bagi tiap-tiap||ummat||Kami telah menjadikan||cara peribadatan||supaya mereka mengingat/menyebut||nama||Allah||atas||apa||Dia rezekikan pada mereka||dari||binatang||ternak||maka Tuhanmu||Tuhan||satu/esa||maka kepada-Nya||berserah dirilah kamu||dan berilah kabar gembira||orang-orang yang tunduk/patuh

translations.text: Wa-likulli ummatin ja'alnaa mansakal liyazkurus mal laahi 'alaa maa razaqahum mim baheematil an'aam; failaahukum ilaahunw Waahidun falahooo aslimoo; Wa-bashshiril mukhbiteen

words.id: dan apabila||dibacakan||atas mereka||ayat-ayat Kami||nyata/terang||kamu melihat||dalam/pada||muka||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||keingkaran||hampir-hampir mereka||mereka akan menyerang||kepada orang-orang yang||(mereka) membacakan||atas mereka||ayat-ayat Kami||katakanlah||apakah akan kuterangkan padamu||dengan yang lebih buruk||dari||yang demikian itu||api/neraka||telah mengancamkannya||Allah||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dengan seburuk-buruk||tempat kembali
words.en: And when||are recited||to them||Our Verses||clear||you will recognize||on||(the) faces||(of) those who||disbelieve||the denial||They almost||attack||those who||recite||to them||Our Verses||Say||Then shall I inform you||of worse||than||that||The Fire||Allah (has) promised it||Allah (has) promised it||(for) those who||disbelieve||and wretched||(is) the destination

translations.text: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyyinaatin ta'rifu fee wujoohil lazeena kafarul munkara yakaadoona yastoona bil-lazeena yatloona alaihim Aayaatinaa; qul afa-unab-bi'ukum bisharrim min zaalikum; an-Naaru Wa-'adahal laahul lazeena kafaroo Wa-bi'sal maseer

words.id: wahai||manusia||telah dijadikan||perumpamaan||maka dengarkanlah||padanya (perumpamaan itu)||sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||kamu seru||dari||selain||Allah||mereka tidak||dapat menciptakan||seekor lalat||walaupun||mereka berkumpul||untuknya||dan jika||merampas mereka||lalat itu||sesuatu||tidaklah||mereka mempertahankannya/merebutnya||dari padanya||lemah||orang yang mencari/menyembah||dan orang yang dicari/disembah
words.en: O mankind||O mankind||Is set forth||an example||so listen||to it||Indeed||those whom||you invoke||besides Allah||besides Allah||besides Allah||will never||create||a fly||even if||they gathered together||for it||And if||snatched away from them||the fly||a thing||not||they (could) take it back||from it||So weak||(are) the seeker||and the one who is sought

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu duriba masalun fastami'oo lah; innal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi laien yakhluqoo zubaabanw Wa-lawi ijtama'oo lahoo Wa-ien yaslub-humuz zubaabu shai'an laa yastanqizoohu minh; da'ufat taalibu wal-matloob

words.id: mereka tidak||menghargakan||Allah||sebenar-benar||penghargaan kepada-Nya||sesungguhnya||Allah||sungguh Maha Kuat||Maha Perkasa
words.en: Not||they (have) estimated||Allah||(with) due||[His] estimation||Indeed||Allah||(is) surely All-Strong||All-Mighty

translations.text: Maa qadrul laaha haqqa qadrih; innal laaha la-Qawiyyun 'Azeez

words.id: Allah||memilih||dari||Malaikat||utusan-utusan||dan dari||manusia||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Mendengar||Maha Melihat
words.en: Allah||chooses||from||the Angels||Messengers||and from||the mankind||Indeed||Allah||(is) All-Hearer||All-Seer

translations.text: Allahu yastafee minal malaaa'ikati Rusulanw Wa-minan naas; innal laaha Samee'un Baseer

words.id: (Allah) mengetahui||apa yang||diantara||tangan/hadapan mereka||dan apa||belakang mereka||dan kepada||Allah||dikembalikan||segala urusan
words.en: He knows||what||(is) before them||(is) before them||and what||(is) after them||And to||Allah||return||all the matters

translations.text: Ya'lamu maa baina aydeehim Wa-maa khalfahum; Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||ruku'lah kamu||dan sujudlah kamu||dan sembahlah||Tuhan kalian||dan berbuatlah||kebaikan||agar kalian||kamu beruntung
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||Bow||and prostrate||and worship||your Lord||and do||[the] good||so that you may||be successful

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanur ka'oo wasjudoo wa'budoo Rabbakum waf'alul khaira la'allakum tuflihoon

words.id: dan berjihadlah kamu||di||(jalan) Allah||sebenar-benar||jihadnya||Dia||memilih kamu||dan Dia tidak||menjadikan||atas kalian||dalam||agama||dari||kesempitan||agama||bapak kamu||Ibrahim||Dia||menampakan kamu||orang-orang muslim||dari||sebelum/dahulu||dan dalam||ini||supaya adalah||Rasul||menjadi saksi||atas kalian||dan adalah kamu||menjadi saksi||atas||manusia||maka dirikanlah||sholat||dan tunaikanlah||zakat||dan berpegang teguhlah kamu||kepada Allah||Dia||pelindung kamu||maka sebaik-baik||pelindung||dan sebaik-baik||penolong
words.en: And strive||for||Allah||(with the) striving due (to) Him||(with the) striving due (to) Him||He||(has) chosen you||and not||placed||upon you||in||the religion||any||difficulty||(The) religion||(of) your father||Ibrahim||He||named you||Muslims||before||before||and in||this||that may be||the Messenger||a witness||over you||and you may be||witnesses||on||the mankind||So establish||the prayer||and give||zakah||and hold fast||to Allah||He||(is) your Protector||so an Excellent||[the] Protector||and an Excellent||[the] Helper

translations.text: Wa-jaahidoo fil laahi haqqa jihaadih; Huwaj tabaakum Wa-maa ja'ala alaikum fid deeni min haraj; Millata abeekum ibraaheem; Huwa sammaakumul muslimeena min qablu Wa-fee haaza li-yakoonar Rasoolu shaheedan alaikum Wa-takoonoo shuhadaaa'a 'alan naas; fa-aqeemus salaata Wa-aatuz zakaata wa'tasimoo billaahi Huwa mawlaakum fani'mal mawlaa Wa-ni'man naseer
